intro: Arachnothryx flores-olverae, commonly known as the Flores-olvera arachnothryx, is a rare plant species endemic to the island of Flores in Indonesia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes a wide variety of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments within the tropical rainforests of Flores. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
